item.title: Poken Pulse Business Networking Gadget
item.description: Traditional business networking relies heavily on exchanging physical business cards, a practice that persists despite the rise of smartphones and online networking. Poken offers a modern alternative by digitizing the process. The Poken device, a small gadget shaped like a four-fingered hand, allows users to exchange contact information wirelessly. When two Poken devices touch, they transfer unique codes linked to the users’ online profiles. Unlike traditional business cards, Poken stores contact data in an online portal, making it easier to manage and search.
